CAMERA_LOCATION.MECHANICAL_STRUCTURE_FOR_CAMERA: Mechanical structure for camera mounting necessary?

BENEFITS.COST_RATE_TOOLTIP: How much costs one minute of work?
BENEFITS.DURATION_TEST_TOOLTIP: How much manual inspection time can be saved by AIQX camera inspection?
BENEFITS.EXPECTED_REDUCTION_FIELD_COST: Expected reduction of field costs per year [€/year]
BENEFITS.REDUCING_FIELD_COST_TOOLTIP: Can the AIQX camera inspection reduce field cost e.g. less defects leave the plant with this inspection?
BENEFITS.REDUCING_INLINE_REWORK_TOOLTIP: Can the AIQX camera inspection reduce inline rework? E.g. AIQX replaces a V60 camera station and is installed much closer at the place of assembly, so inline rework is much easier?
BENEFITS.REDUCING_OFFLINE_REWORK_TOOLTIP: Can the AIQX camera inspection reduce offline rework? E.g. AIQX is installed closely at the place of assembly so the problem can be solved inline?
BENEFITS.SAVING_MANUAL_TEST_TOOLTIP: Can the AIQX camera inspection save time of a manual inspections or replace it completely?
BENEFITS.TESTED_VEHICLES_PER_YEAR_TOOLTIP: How many vehicles per year will be inspected with the AIQX camera inspection in the future?

DESCRIPTION.COSTS_FOR_USE_CASE: Are the costs for this use case implementation covered by your department?
DESCRIPTION.COSTS_FOR_USE_CASE_TOOLTIP:
Help tooltip: Cost indication 
S Use case (1 camera, check for existence):
    Hardware: {{s_use_case.hardware}}€
    Implementation: {{s_use_case.implementation}}€
    Installation: {{s_use_case.installation}}€
    Annual costs: {{s_use_case.annual_costs}}€ 
M Use case (2 cameras, check for variance):
    Hardware: {{m_use_case.hardware}}€
    Implementation: {{m_use_case.implementation}}€
    Installation: {{m_use_case.installation}}€
    Annual costs: {{m_use_case.annual_costs}}€ 
L Use Case (>2 cameras, complex inspection logic with multiple features):
    Hardware: {{l_use_case.hardware}}€
    Implementation: {{l_use_case.implementation}}€
    Installation: {{l_use_case.installation}}€
    Annual costs: {{l_use_case.annual_costs}}€
DESCRIPTION.INSPECTION_DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP: Give a short description how the inspection should be performed e.g. "for every G20/G21 it needs to be checked whether all underbody screws are mounted"
DESCRIPTION.INSPECTION_FEATURE_AVAILABLE: Inspected part already available or part of a pre-series vehicle?
DESCRIPTION.NAME: Name
DESCRIPTION.REASON_OF_URGENCY: Special reason for urgent use case implementation
DESCRIPTION.REASON_OF_URGENCY_TOOLTIP: Is there a special reason this use case needs to be implemented very urgent e.g. SoP etc.?

ERROR_MESSAGES.DOT_NOT_ALLOWED: May not contain a dot character

EXAMPLE_IMAGES.DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP: Describe how OK and NOK images are recognized and how the individual variants can be distinguished.
EXAMPLE_IMAGES.DRAG_DROP_HERE:
Drag and drop images here
or
EXAMPLE_IMAGES.TITLE: Upload at least 1 OK and 1 NOK or 2 similar variants of the feature
EXAMPLE_IMAGES.TOOLTIP: Upload example images of the inspection feature at your chosen camera position in the production line. If possible take the images from the same angle like the future camera will be.

FEATURE_DEFINITION.CAMERA_DISTANCE_CM_TOOLTIP: Distance between camera and feature at the chosen location (approximately)
FEATURE_DEFINITION.CAMERA_INTEGRATION_TOOLTIP: Is there e.g. a V60 station close by where this inspection can be performed as well?
FEATURE_DEFINITION.FEATURE_HALTED_OR_MOVING: Feature halted/moving while inspection is performed
FEATURE_DEFINITION.NUMBER_OF_VARIANTS_TOOLTIP: Variant means any difference in the given feature that occurs over all inspected vehicles. Every vehicle where the feature changes e.g. in colour, location, shape, design, orientation etc. is a separate variant and needs to be listed here.
FEATURE_DEFINITION.POSITION_AND_ORIENTATION_ALWAYS_THE_SAME: Feature position and orientation for every inspected vehicle always the same?

INFRASTRUCTURE.NSI_SOCKET_AVAILABLE: Network socket (NSI) available at the chosen camera position?
INFRASTRUCTURE.POE_AVAILABLE: Power over Ethernet (PoE) available at the chosen camera position?
INFRASTRUCTURE.POWER_AVAILABLE: Power socket available at the chosen camera position?

PROJECT_PLANNING.COMPLETION_DATE_TOOLTIP: Latest possible completion date for productive usage of this use case
PROJECT_PLANNING.NAME: Name

TITLES.HARDWARE_COST_DEFINITION: Definition of hardware and cost estimation

USE_CASE_OFFER.COMPLEXITY_DESCRIPTION: Depending on the selection of the size (S,M,L), corresponding values for the costs are generated on slide 5 for "implementation" and "yearly costs".
USE_CASE_OFFER.COMPLEXITY_FOR_DATA_SCIENCE: Definition of use case complexity for data science
USE_CASE_OFFER.COMPLEXITY_FOR_IT: Definition of use case complexity for IT
USE_CASE_OFFER.COMPLEXITY_FOR_PLATFORM: Definition of use case complexity for platform
USE_CASE_OFFER.NECESSARY_TRAINING_IMAGES_FOR_NOK: Number of training images for NOK
USE_CASE_OFFER.NECESSARY_TRAINING_IMAGES_FOR_OK: Number of training images for OK
USE_CASE_OFFER.NUMBER_OF_PICTURES_TAKEN_PER_VEHICLE: Number of pictures taken per vehicle
USE_CASE_OFFER.TIMELINE_COMPLETIONDATE_DIFF: The completion date and timeline for implementation are different.

USE_CASE_ORDER.ACCEPT_NEW_DATE_TOOLTIP: You must first accept the new go live date
USE_CASE_ORDER.EXACT_FIGURE_CHANGE: Exact figure may change marginally during implementation
USE_CASE_ORDER.IMPLEMENTATION_ON_DATE: The use case can be implemented on the required date ({{ completionDate }})
USE_CASE_ORDER.NOT_IMPLEMENTATION_ON_DATE:
The use case can not be implemented by the desired date of {{ completionDate }} 
The earliest date possible is {{ timelineForImplementation }}
USE_CASE_ORDER.USE_CASE_COSTS_TOOLTIP: These one-time costs are to be understood as a guidance. Costs may still change slightly in the process of use case implementation.

VARIANTS.ANONYMIZATION_NECESSARY: Potentially employees in the picture / anonymization necessary
VARIANTS.ARCHIVING_IMAGES_TOOLTIP: If no is selected always the last 5.000 taken images are available.
VARIANTS.DESCRIPTION_IDENTIFICATION_CRITERIA_TOOL: E.g. for PHEVs the identification criteria in the order data would be "engine type = X".
VARIANTS.EMERGENCY_CONCEPT: Emergency concept exists and can be performed for up to 72h
VARIANTS.EMERGENCY_CONCEPT_TOOLTIP: In case of a breakdown of the AIQX system the inspection needs to be done manually up to 72h
VARIANTS.IDENTIFICATION_CRITERIA_TOOLTIP: How can that variant be detected in the given order data
VARIANTS.MAX_RESPONSE_TIME: Maximum allowable time to return inspection result (in seconds)
VARIANTS.NUMBER_OF_VARIANTS_TOOLTIP: Variant means any difference in the given feature that occurs over all produced vehicles

KPIS.TITLE: Average processing time of all use cases of this plant

LABEL.DRAG_AND_DROP: Drag and drop images here (PNG or JPEG max. 20MB)
LABEL.DRAG_AND_DROP_PDF: Drag and drop image or PDF here (PNG, JPEG or PDF max. 20MB)

STEP_SUBMITTED.BODY:
Your feedback has been submitted successfully.

An email will be sent to the initiator of this use case.
Once the next step is completed you will be notified by an email.
STEP_SUBMITTED.CONFIRM: Return to use case detail view
STEP_SUBMITTED.DETAILED_REQUEST_TEXT1: Thank you for providing the requested information!
STEP_SUBMITTED.DETAILED_REQUEST_TEXT2: An email will be send to you upon completion to inform you about the result and next steps.
STEP_SUBMITTED.INITIAL_REQUEST_TEXT1: Thank you very much for your request!
STEP_SUBMITTED.INITIAL_REQUEST_TEXT2:
Your use case will now be subjected to a feasibility check
 by the AIQX-Team to clarify if the desired inspection feature 
can be implemented by AIQX in general.
STEP_SUBMITTED.INITIAL_REQUEST_TEXT3:
Upon completion you will receive an email to inform you about 
feasibility and next steps.
STEP_SUBMITTED.MESSAGE_NOTICE: You will receive an additional confirmation of this message via email
STEP_SUBMITTED.OFFER_ACCEPTED_TEXT2:
A member of our team will contact you soon 
to discuss further steps and details.
STEP_SUBMITTED.OFFER_DECLINED_TEXT1:
Thank you very much for your time. 
We wish you success with the implementation of your use case.
STEP_SUBMITTED.OFFER_DECLINED_TEXT2:
If you have any questions or suggestions, 
contact us at: info_aiqx@bmw.de
STEP_SUBMITTED.TITLE: Feedback submitted successfully!

USE_CASE.MANDATORY_MARK: The fields marked with * are mandatory
